name: Deep Love ホスト
summary: The continuation from Deep Love: Ayu no Monogatari. This revolves around Yoshiyuki, the lad who was in need of heart surgery in Ayu's Story. After Ayu's death, it seems that Yoshiyuki wants to learn anything, everything. And thus he tries out for a job as a host and says that he's willing to sell his body...
info:
• 册数: 2
  • 话数: 6
  • 出版社: 讲谈社、講談社
  • 连载杂志: 别册Friend、別冊フレンド
  • 原作: Yoshi
  • 发售日: 2005
  • 作画: 吉井ユウ

relations.title: Deep Love レイナの運命
